channel.title: Hiring on Greg Herlein
channel.description: Recent content in Hiring on Greg Herlein

item.title: Dream Teams
item.description: A friend was telling me about “Dream Teams” at Netflix and I realized that is exactly what I have been trying to build/encourage around me. That is what I want!

item.title: Advice to New Developers (or, How to Get Hired)
item.description: I get asked a lot by new developers: “how do I find a coding job?” What should I do/learn to get a really good job? Here’s my advice.
